name: Shores of Mushroom Isle
description:
In "Shores of Mushroom Isle" you explore a mysterious island and meet its strange inhabitants.

After you shipwrecked on an unfamiliar beach during a storm you'll have to find a way off the island with the help of peculiar characters.

This game was developed within four months as part of the Experimental Games Lab course at the Bauhaus University, Weimar. It was the first game for everyone of us.
For further games created this semester visit: https://bauhausuniweimar.itch.io/

This current version is a playable demo.
The team is planning to continue working on this game for the next semester to expand on the story, size and mechanics of the game. 

Credits:
Gianluca Pandolfo | Project Coordinator
Rojin Akhavan Safa | Character & UI Art, Animations, Lighting
Marvin Felgentrebe | Background & Object Art
Jakob Wulfert | Sound Design & Music
Christian Paffrath | Programming
Rojin, Marvin, Jakob, Chris | Concept, Story, Dialogue
